[/quote]
Don’t use this or rip it from whateverXXXscape, make your own. How do you expect to have a unique or fun server if you’re willing to use tutorials/rip from other servers?[/quote]

item.title: [PI] Dungeoneering Base
item.dc:creator: @Team_Rocket Team_Rocket
item.description:
@Team_Rocket wrote:

[quote=“586, post:23, topic:421430”][quote author=sk8rdude461 link=topic=524092.msg3875801#msg3875801 date=1325662800]
Was to lazy to. Just stole parts of code.

Oh by the way guys this was ripped from rune-demon.com:

http://rune-demon.com/showthread.php?t=64
[/quote]

I am Resolute from Rune-Demon.

  1. Change the difficulty to a “1/10”.
  2. Part of this is ripped.
  3. I don’t see why people insist on adding this content to anything below a 562. I’m guessing because they can’t program anything except for 317’s.
  4. Do it right or don’t do it at all, and this isn’t doing it right AT ALL.

I’m done with my rant now, also use Java code tags. Other that that this looks O.K. but I wouldn’t ever use it. Thanks for your contribution to the community.

Double EDIT: NOVEMBER NICE GRAVEDIG YO

  1. True, it isn’t difficult to do the tutorial since it’s a C&P.
  2. “I didn’t even notice that until you said something. Thanks for that.”
  3. I don’t see anything wrong with adding dungeoneering to a 317, there’s a high abundance of servers with dungeoneering implemented to their 317 today. 508 revision (s) and above are not difficult to program on. What makes you assume they are difficult to program with? Everyone has their own perspective on which revision they like and which they don’t, I for one like the 317 revision.
  4. I have stated at the beginning of the thread that this isn’t even nearby completition this is just a base which needs finishing.

I appreciate your comment, sorry for the late response I haven’t visited Moparscape lately.[/quote]

I wasn’t insinuating that higher revisions means harder programming. That’s the only reason I can think of as to why anyone would want to add higher content to a 317-319 cache.

Read full topic

item.title: [PI] Dungeoneering Base

[quote=“sk8rdude461, post:18, topic:421430”]Was to lazy to. Just stole parts of code.

[quote=“Team_Rocket, post:20, topic:421430”]1. Change the difficulty to a “1/10”.
2. Part of this is ripped.
3. I don’t see why people insist on adding this content to anything below a 562. I’m guessing because they can’t program anything except for 317’s.
4. Do it right or don’t do it at all, and this isn’t doing it right AT ALL.

I’m done with my rant now, also use Java code tags. Other that that this looks O.K. but I wouldn’t ever use it. Thanks for your contribution to the community.

Double EDIT: NOVEMBER NICE GRAVEDIG YO[/quote]

  1. True, it isn’t difficult to do the tutorial since it’s a C&P.
  2. “I didn’t even notice that until you said something. Thanks for that.”

I don’t see anything wrong with adding dungeoneering to a 317, there’s a high abundance of servers with dungeoneering implemented to their 317 today. 508 revision (s) and above are not difficult to program on. What makes you assume they are difficult to program with? Everyone has their own perspective on which revision they like and which they don’t, I for one like the 317 revision.
  4. I have stated at the beginning of the thread that this isn’t even nearby completition this is just a base which needs finishing.

I appreciate your comment, sorry for the late response I haven’t visited Moparscape lately.
